transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] 
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji sir, abhi aa rahi hai aawaz aapko?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Main puchh rahi hu sir ki aapko jo lead milti hai isme wo pata hai kitni milti hai?
Executive: Nahi wo to start kiya na.
Customer: Haan, ab main bata deti hu jo aapki TrustSeal wali services hai na, isme aapko 20 lead weekly aur two bonus lead daily milti hai, theek hai? Matlab aapko jo purchase pattern set karna hai wo char lead aap per day consume karoge, char lead per day consume karoge.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai? Aap char lead expire ho jayegi sir, jaise do daily basis pe aapko lead milti hai to jaise aaj mil gayi aapko lead, 12 baje ke baad mil jati hai aur aaj 12 baje tak agar aapne do lead consume nahi kari apni to wo aapki lapse ho jayengi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai? Aur jo weekly milti hai wo 20 lead weekly milti hai aapko, agar aapne week mein pura week mein agar consume nahi kiya, jaise do din aaj aap busy ho gaye aapne consume nahi kar paye, to kal aap jab baithiyega to aap apni puri lead consume kar sakte ho, theek hai?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan, to is tarah se aapko na use karna padega. Product list mein jo mera uske andar jo product hai uski lead nahi dikha rahi.
Customer: Kya cheez sir, fir se bataiye?
Executive: Product nahi dikha raha tha.
Customer: Product nahi dikh raha hai?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Jab product wale section mein jaoge aap tab product aap waha pe aapko show ho jayega. Product ke hisab se lead nahi dikha rahi.
Executive: Product ke accordingly kyunki sir abhi aapne na teen char hi product bahut zyada update kiye hue hai, ek marble jaali ka product update hai, ek marble temple update hai, ek marble gate update hai, hai na? To aap isme thoda sa product wagera apna increase kar lijiye, then aapko dikhna start ho jayegi, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Abhi categories bahut zyada nahi hai is wajah se aapko waha pe dikhai nahi de rahi hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Theek hai sir? Aur second cheez sir ek cheez bataiyega aapne TrustSeal apna pay kiya to 45000 plus GST pay kiya hoga na sir?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To aapne fir ek saal ka 45000 pay kiya hai fir dusri saal renewable karayenge tab fir 45000 pay karenge, aise aapko teen saal ka 84000 plus GST pe mil raha tha to aapne teen saal ka kyun nahi kar liya tha sir?
Executive: Pata nahi mujhe.
Customer: Kya cheez sir?
Executive: Pata nahi.
Customer: Aapne kiya hoga na sir?
Executive: Haan maine bhi kiya tha, mere ko jo utna wo jo. Aap baat ek cheez sochiye, ek cheez dekhiye sir ki aap apne 45000 plus GST abhi is saal pay kiya hai, theek hai? Ek saal baad aapka jab renewable aayega tab fir aap 45000 plus GST pay karoge, to yaani ki 90000 plus GST aap sirf do saal ka pay kar rahe ho. Samajh rahe hain? Hmm.
Customer: 90000 plus GST aap do saal ka pay kar rahe ho aur aapko teen saal ki services jo hai wo 84000 plus GST mein mil rahi thi. To aapke liye teen saal mein zyada benefit tha.
Executive: To ye bataya nahi na pehle ki teen saal mein. Aapko kisi aapko kisi ne bataya nahi tha ye cheez?
Customer: Nahi bataya.
Executive: Kaise ho sakta hai sir aapko bataya nahi ho? Abhi abhi aapke paas mein abhi bhi agar aap karna chaho to abhi bhi kar sakte ho sir. Aapka jo abhi humne pehle dekh lete hai fir baad mein karenge.
Executive: Baad mein sir fir adjust nahi ho payega, jaise aapne abhi 45000 plus GST pay kiya hai na, to hum aapko pehle dekh lete hai fir baad mein karenge.
Customer: Pehle dekh lete hai fir baad mein karenge.
Executive: Kya cheez sir? Kam karte hai.
Customer: Ye dekh lete hai kaam karta hai nahi karta fir check aage chalenge. Ah, abhi kyunki abhi aapne recently aapki company active hoke aayi hai to main request dal sakti hu, agar aapko nahi bataya to main request dal sakti hu company se ki aapko teen saal ke liye services chahiye thi. To abhi kya hoga ki aapne jo amount pay kiya hai wo aapka deduct ho jayega. Pehle dekh lete hai fir baad mein karenge.
Customer: Pehle dekh lete hai fir baad mein karenge.
Executive: Kitne saal kya cheez sir sorry aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi thi main samajh nahi pai.
Customer: Pehle isliye ye service dekhiye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Fir sir baad mein nahi ho payega, abhi aap jab aaj maine pehli call liya hai maine isiliye aapko batana chaha agar abhi aap bolte ho to ho jayega baad mein fir nahi ho payega aapka. Adjust nahi kar payenge hum. Jaise 84000 plus GST main bata rahi hu to usme se aapka 45000 plus GST adjust ho jayega jo remaining amount hoga bas wahi aapko pay karna rahega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai? Agar aapko final karna ho to aap bata dijiyega nahi karna ho to fir kyunki ab main abhi abhi aap aapki company mere paas aayi hai to main abhi company se request kar sakti hu ki aapko ye karna tha teen saal ke liye karna tha but aapne aapko inform nahi kiya gaya is wajah se aapne ek saal ka kiya hoga. Aur ye zyada better rahega kyunki 45000 45000 90000 aap sirf do saal ka pay karoge aur aise aapko 84000 mein teen saal ka mil raha hai.
Executive: Do mahine mein. Abhi aage aage itne bolna bhi yahi karna chahiye. Haan aap baat kar lo aur bata dena jab bhi ho.
Executive: Theek hai abhi services to samajh mein aa gayi na sir aapko kaise use karna hai? Haan haan.
Executive: Aapka jo including aa raha hai na 46000 sirf aa raha hai including GST aur aapki teen saal ki services aage forward ho jayegi. Plus two month extra services rahegi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai main aapko ek baar bhej de rahi hu aap ek baar check kar lijiyega. Bheja hua hai maine aapko mail pe, theek hai? Aap check kar lena aap jab bhi baithiyega aur comparison kar lijiyega monthly cost nikal ke.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Haan normal.
Customer: Okay. Aur koi issue aur kuch puchhna hai aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Theek hai aap pehle na product apne sare update kar dijiyega jo bhi reh gaye hain abhi tak. Aur koshish kariye ki update ho raha tha. Haan koshish kariye ki agar 100 se plus agar aap product dal sakte hain to wo rahega. Update kar rakha hai update kar do. Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product leads not showing.

- Inquired about the three-year plan.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about TrustSeal services.

- Executive explained how to use leads.

- Executive offered to request a three-year plan.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, subscription, product update
